articles.title: ‘It’s terrible’: Fears grow that Trump is kneecapping the Pentagon
articles.description: The president's shoot-from-the-hip style is putting the military's reputation at risk.
articles.content: Questions about the Pentagon's credibility carry a host of real-world implications, from allies not trusting America's word, to worries that more troops will commit war crimes, to growing skepticism over intelligence the Pentagon uses to justify military acti… [+9417 chars]

articles.title: Trump's Mideast allies duck Iran confrontation
articles.description: For years, they called for a showdown with Tehran. But when it finally happened, they quickly called for calm.
articles.content:
Irans neighbors want Iran deterred but they dont want Iran to be lashing out, and the question is How you can deter an adversary without ever striking that adversary? said Jon Alterman of the Center for Strategic and International Studies. 
Barack Obama, Tru… [+4433 chars]

articles.title: Senate Democrats break with Pelosi over impeachment trial
articles.description: "If it’s serious and urgent, send them over. If it isn’t, don’t send it over," says Sen. Dianne Feinstein.
articles.content:
The longer it goes on the less urgent it becomes, said Sen. Dianne Feinstein (D-Calif.) So if its serious and urgent, send them over. If it isnt, dont send it over.
Several other Senate Democrats also showed their impatience with the Democratic leaders curre… [+5589 chars]

articles.title: How the Senate could vote at Trump's impeachment trial
articles.description: Here’s POLITICO’s analysis of how senators would vote if the House impeached the president.
